headline: Trump Tightens The Screws On This Clean Energy Giant, But Solar Stocks Shines Bright
summary: Shares of wind energy titan Orsted plummeted more than 16% on the Copenhagen Stock Exchange Monday after the Trump administration late Friday issued a "stop-work order" for the company's Revolution Wind Project off the Rhode Island coast.  Orsted reports the project is already 80% complete.  Meanwhile, solar stocks moved higher.

headline: First Solar (FSLR) Is Down 7.8% After Trump’s Solar Comments and Weak Sector Signals – What’s Changed
summary: Earlier this week, First Solar faced sector-wide headwinds following President Trump's comments suggesting diminished federal support for solar projects and a weaker earnings report from Canadian Solar. This combination of policy uncertainty and weaker industry signals intensified investor concerns about the outlook for the broader renewable energy sector, particularly in relation to regulatory and demand challenges. To understand how these heightened policy risks could affect First Solar's...
